info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong shower will impact portions of south central Chesterfield and northeastern Dinwiddie Counties, the City of Colonial Heights and the City of Petersburg through 645 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong shower near Chesterfield Court House, or near Chester, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall of up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rainfall could lead to ponding of water on roadways. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Colonial Heights around 620 PM EDT. Fort Lee, Matoaca and Ettrick around 625 PM EDT. Virginia State University around 630 PM EDT. Petersburg around 635 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include New Bohemia, Petersburg Airport, Beach, Richard Bland College, Burgess, Addison, Petersburg National Battlefield and Chesterfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
